short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fetch and import your connections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension tool to enhance your LinkedIn experience and boost your productivity.

Keep a list of LinkedIn profiles you visit handy

Export profiles you visited to CSV

Automatically import your connections into your The Swarm account

Back up your connections and browsing history in case of loosing access to your LinkedIn account

The Swarm (https://theswarm.com) is a Go-To-Network platform, allowing companies to create a collective network sorted by connection strength.

Questions? Contact us at hello@theswarm.com
